translation.text: Delays to some services in both directions due to a customer disturbance at Rhodes earlier and a train requiring mechanical repairs at Woy Woy earlier. Please allow plenty of addition travel time, listen to announcements and check information screens for further information.

Some services delayed up to 10 min due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions between Gordon and Pymble earlier.  Frequent services are still operating, although journey times may be longer. Please check transport apps, information screens and listen for announcements before joining your service
Be weather wise and avoid rushing and stepping in puddles to prevent slips, trips and falls.

A League: Sydney FC v Perth Glory - Netstrata Jubilee Stadium, Kogarah
19:10 to 21:00
- The closest station to Netstrata Jubilee Stadium is Carlton on the T4 Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line. The stadium is a 10 minute walk from the station via Jubilee Avenue.

For details, please visit https://transportnsw.info/events/2021/04/league-sydney-fc-v-perth-glory#homepage
Special Event - Sydney Royal Easter Show

Until Monday 12 April
Sydney Royal Easter Show 2021 - Sydney Showground, Sydney Olympic Park
Daily from 09:00 until 23:00
- The closest station to the Sydney Royal Easter Show is Olympic Park. 
- Express and limited-stop trains run daily from Central and Western line stations throughout the show to help you get there and home again. 
- Trains also run from Lidcombe to Olympic Park every 10 minutes until late. 
- Sydney Olympic Park Major Event Buses are running on all nine routes each day of the Easter Show from early morning until late.

For details visit https://transportnsw.info/events/2021/04/sydney-royal-easter-show-2021 and plan your trip at transportnsw.info/plan

Due to a slow moving freight train ahead. Please allow up to 15 minutes of additional travel time.

This service will now operate via the T9 Northern Line due to signal equipment repairs caused by weather conditions between Gordon and Pymble earlier

This service will stop Hornsby, Normanhurst, then all stations to Epping, then all stations to Strathfield where it will terminate. You may have to change at Strathfield to complete your journey.
Canley Vale, Fairfield, Yennora, Guildford, Merrylands, Granville, Clyde, Auburn Due to track equipment repairs at Leppington. Please allow additional travel time.
The escalator between suburban concourse and intercity platforms is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 1777.
The escalator between the concourse and the bus interchange is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4023.
The lift between the footbridge and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service. For assistance, ask staff or call 4962 9437.
The lift between the concourse and platforms 2/3 is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 4223 5576.
The lift between the concourse and Railway Street is temporarily out of service. For assistance ask station staff or call 9673 3059.

From 8 April until 30 June some stairs between the station and the street level will close for upgrade works. During this time follow the signs and staff directions to the nearest available stairs. If you need further assistance, see station staff  or call 93794110.
Please take extra care on the platform during platform renewal works and stand behind the yellow line on the platform prior to boarding your train.

Driveway repair works at Bondi Junction Interchange
From Tuesday 6 April to Monday 19 April 2021 construction work is taking place at the driveway into the bus interchange at Grosvenor Street and Newland Street.
The western side of Grosvenor Street, between Oxford Street and Grafton Street, will be closed to pedestrians. There will be no access from the bus interchange directly onto Grosvenor Street during this time.
For access into the station, please use the Meriton entrance via the Oxford Street Mall or the entrances via Grafton Street.

There are changes happening at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works. Access to certain areas of the station and platforms may mean using different stairs, escalators and lifts. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff. For detailed information please visit https://transportnsw.info/alerts/details#/6049959

From Monday 5 April to Monday 19 April 2021 stair refurbishment work is taking place at the Terminus street station entry to Petersham Station.

For access into the station, please use the underpass to the Trafalgar street station entrance. If you need further assistance contact station staff on 9752 8426.
Due to station redevelopment work some platforms have reduced capacity. Please avoid standing in front of construction zones and remain behind the yellow line on the platform

A new Metro concourse is being constructed on the northern end of Sydenham Station. 
While the concourse is being installed, please use the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. 
If you need help, please ask staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info
